spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial translation. Room layout and adjacency are perfectly preserved. Door orientations are consistently accurate. Minor scaling compression observed in the utility area but highly faithful overall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. No text or measurement lines present. No hallucinated rooms. All walls are clearly visible in a clean cutaway view on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style representations are used throughout. Kitchen counters, beds, and dining table match the plan positions. Minor loss of detail in the specific terrace furniture arrangement.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry with flat colors and soft shading. The camera is correctly set to an isometric orthographic view.

detected_errors.description: Slight layout distortion in the utility room and adjoining TOI-1 areas regarding wall thickness consistency compared to the plan.
